GULF OF GUINEA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
M/V ATTACKED BY PIRATES IN
00-44N 006-13E AT 301200Z NOV. VESSELS
ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO
IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
